name: Hit the Green!
description:
Enjoy a little round of golf while discovering the charming and colorful scenery, your ears soothed by the pleasant sound of Bossa Nova. 

This unique First Person Golfer is truly going to make your day!

Game created for Ludum Dare #41

Theme : Combine two incompatible genres

Time : 72 hours

Controls : You can change between WASD/ZQSD controls in the input window when you launch the game.

Chloé Barreau (BRBack) : Graphic Design

Félix Belthoise (Azathothep) : Game Design & Music

Loïc da Silva (AsbelGrants) : Game Design & Sound Effects

Constance Gautier (Kallysto) : Team Leader

Séverin Michaut (Batagogo) : Programming

Clément Patricio (StarSlash) : Game Design & Programming

Horace Ribout (Horace_As_A_Dino) : Programming

Théo Verpillat (UnBonJusDeFruits) : Game Design & Graphic Design
